name: power saw production, without catalytic converter | power saw, without catalytic converter | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23716/documentation

This dataset represents the production of a power saw without catalytic converter. 

The activity starts with the semi-finished products and raw materials at the factory gate.

The inventory accounts for the input and disposal of all materials, their (pre-) processing and the energy required for the production and maintenance of the power saw represented by this dataset.
The dataset does not contain fuel consumption or related emissions. These issues are inventoried in the respective dataset on the operation of the machinery. The dataset does also not contain an estimate of the infrastructure required to produce the power saw.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2818:Manufacture of power-driven hand tools

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Original data obtained mainly by personal communication with manufacturer of power saws; data converted from ecoinvent 2.2 and adapted for ecoinvent v.3

flow.name: power saw, without catalytic converter
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2818:Manufacture of power-driven hand tools

exchanges.description: Interpolated from ecoinvent 2.2 dataset for a power saw of 5.5 kg, (according to producer information) excluding chain and blade; source: Kellenberger, D., H.-J. Althaus, T. Künniger, M. Lehmann, N. Jungbluth and P. Thalmann (2007): Life cycle inventories of building products. Final report ecoinvent 2000 No. 7, EMPA Duebendorf, Swiss Centre for Life Cycle Inventories, Duebendorf, CH.
